Pre-Game Insights: The Sacramento Kings will look to build on their overtime win against the Phoenix Suns as they take on the San Antonio Spurs.
The Spurs are coming off a 22-60 overall record last season, while the Kings finished 46-36 overall.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is scheduled for Monday, 8 p.m. EST at San Antonio.
The current BETMGM SPORTSBOOK LINE is Kings -1.5; over/under is 223.5.
The Kings averaged 116.6 points per game last season, while the Spurs averaged 112.1 points per game.
Others: The Spurs have several injuries, including Malaki Branham, Tre Jones, and Jeremy Sochan, while the Kings are without Devin Carter and Orlando Robinson.
